title: Post 1
description: You can add the new main-element to Modernizr 2.6.2 by using HTML5 Shiv's window.html5 options to add your own elements to the shiv.
abstract: You can add the new main-element to Modernizr 2.6.2 by using HTML5 Shiv's window.html5 options to add your own elements to the shiv.
